overview: Join the army and see the world! That’s what they told the STAXUS lads when they enlisted for a stretch in uniform. But it isn’t so much distant shores that these horny conscripts see when they’re donning the khaki, as thick, uncut cocks and oodles of hot, pent-up spunk! Not that these horned-up dick-magnets ever risk a court-martial for complaining. If anything, twink recruits like Titus Snow and Johnathan Strake are only too happy and eager to get their ass-holes fucked to the rafters by some of the hottest officers in the ranks – no doubt winning a Purple Heart for their services to hard dick in the process!
title: Army Dropouts
